module.title: Catalog: Bookstore
module.log: Supporting article description for shop lists and mails.
Reinvented data feed for Google Merchant Center (without cache or job).
Moved article cover image URL generation from helper to logic.
Improved data feed to deliver acceptable data (valid for Google Merchant Center).
Integrated archive download of ordered images.
Support mail addresses given for author references.
Enlarge volume column in database model.
Extract article view into several templates.
Change related articles list to slider.
Extend bridge logic for quantity changes.
Add helper for related articles slider.
Add support of weight for shop bridge.
Add categories to sitemap / search index.
module.author: Christian Würker

config.name: feed.copyright
config.title: Copyright notice for content in the channel.

config.name: feed.managingEditor
config.title: Email address for person responsible for editorial content.

config.name: feed.webMaster
config.title: Email address for person responsible for technical issues relating to channel.

config.name: feed.generator
config.title: A string indicating the program used to generate the channel.

config.name: feed.docs
config.title: A URL that points to the documentation for the format used in the RSS file.

config.name: feed.ttl
config.title: A number of minutes that indicates how long a channel can be cached before refreshing from the source.

config.name: feed.skipHours
config.title: An XML element that contains up to 24 hour-sub-elements whose value is a number between 0 and 23

config.name: feed.skipDays
config.title: An XML element that contains up to seven day-sub-elements whose value is Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday or Sunday.

config.name: feed.image.url
config.title: URL of a GIF, JPEG or PNG image that represents the channel.

config.name: feed.image.link
config.title: URL of the site, when the channel is rendered, the image is a link to the site.

config.name: feed.image.title
config.title: Describes the image, it's used in the ALT attribute of the HTML.

config.name: feed.image.width
config.title: Maximum value for width is 144, default value is 88.

config.name: feed.image.height
config.title: Maximum value for height is 400, default value is 31.

module.sql: ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>catalog_bookstore_article_categories` CHANGE `volume` `volume` VARCHAR( 20 ) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '';
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>catalog_bookstore_articles` CHANGE `weight` `weight` FLOAT(8,2) NOT NULL;
